results.t: php - I have a string with "\u00a0", and I need to replace it ...
results.p: Try replacing the double quotes in your str_replace() with single quotes, or escaping the backslash ( "\\u00a0" ).
Unicode Data. Name, NO-BREAK SPACE. Block, Latin-1 Supplement. Category, Separator, Space [Zs]. Combine, 0. BIDI, Common Number Separator [CS].
